Put in your canoe at your own waterside & enjoy the world of nature that is the Nicomekl River out to the ocean. The large open grassy fields beside the River trail are ideal for family, club or church retreats. Property is subject to Streamside Protection bylaw against development (some possible, but is in Sensitive Ecosystem Development Permit Area). Bring your plans to City Hall!
